trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs while serializing or deserializing SAML metadata.
trans-unit.target: 当序列化或反序列化一个 SAML 元数据过程中发生错误时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数将新实例的 <xref:System.Exception.Message*> 属性初始化为系统提供的错误描述消息。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示新实例的初始属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializationException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message> property of the new exception using the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message>属性的新异常使用`message`参数。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示新实例的初始属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 保留序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains the contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 对象，它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializationException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializationException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Metadata.MetadataSerializationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException>属性返回传递到构造函数的相同值。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示新实例的初始属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。
